scripts.servecustomerapp: npm run config -- --environment=dev --app=customerapp && ng serve  --app customerapp --environment dev
scripts.serveinternalapp: npm run config -- --environment=dev --app=internalapp && ng serve  --app internalapp --environment dev
scripts.servethirdpartyapp: npm run config -- --environment=dev --app=thirdpartyapp && ng serve  --app thirdpartyapp --environment dev
scripts.buildcustomerapp: npm run config -- --environment=prod --app=customerapp && ng build  --app customerapp --bh /cust/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildinternalapp: npm run config -- --environment=prod --app=internalapp && ng build  --app internalapp --bh /internalapp/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildthirdpartyapp: npm run config -- --environment=prod --app=thirdpartyapp && ng build  --app thirdpartyapp --bh /thirdpartyapp/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildcustomerappamex: npm run config -- --environment=prodamex --app=customerapp && ng build  --app customerapp --bh /cust/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildinternalappamex: npm run config -- --environment=prodamex --app=internalapp && ng build  --app internalapp --bh /internalapp/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildthirdpartyappamex: npm run config -- --environment=prodamex --app=thirdpartyapp && ng build  --app thirdpartyapp --bh /thirdpartyapp/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildcustomerapplocal: npm run config -- --environment=prod --app=customerapp && ng build  --app customerapp --bh /rush/customer/phasesecond/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
scripts.buildinternalapplocal: npm run config -- --environment=prod --app=internalapp && ng build  --app internalapp --bh /rush/internalapp/phasesecond/ --prod --aot --build-optimizer --named-chunks
